ComicInfo.Title: Taken By This Guy!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Strangers travel to the Carribean to find the coordinates that Yrial secretly slipped to Lady Killer before she was forced to remain on her tribe's island in the sky. The Strangers take the opportunity of being in the tropics by stopping on an island and enjoying some rest and relaxation, something they've been lacking since acquiring their abilities. The Strangers, in civilian garb, are observed by a gang of pirates that have acquired ultra abilities on the same cable car that the Strangers did. A contingency of the Pirates arrive on the Stranger's yacht and demand their money, surprised that their 'victims' have ultra powers as well. The two factions fight in a heated battle that takes place both on the Stranger's yacht and the island they were relaxing on. Meanwhile, Yrial overhears a fellow tribesman try to convince the Chieftan that they should destroy mankind. Eventually the Strangers defeat the Pirates. While some Strangers are left to ponder how both teams started in the same way but took completely different routes in life, they guide their yacht to the coordinates to find the secret behind Yrial's tribe.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-27 20:45:54. [CVDB38641] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:18:40. [Issue ID 54569]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bob Alvord,George Cox III,Robert Alvord,Prisms,Robert Alvord,Prisms
